choices: A unaffliated person in the west
1.content: The time is the early 1800's the place the wild wests of America, the time is ripe for change and there is a war brewing between the factions, but within this tumultuous time there are also smaller stories, will you take part in the conflict or work on your own personal agenda.. the backdrop of the groups need not truly effect what you do, there are villian's and heroes on all sides
1.title: What side are you On

choices: A 7'3 wolfess, beta in a tribe thats fighting for life
8'8 Puma Warrior, Speak soflty, big Belly
5'11 Lynx scout Laugh at the fate of the Stockaders
11.content: The wilds, thats where you have lived, long houses, adobe huts, they have all be possible homes, what you can't stand is the structured,the unnatural nature of what these herbivores are doing, Grazing, ripe for the slaughter. On the other hand, there are some of these grazers though who have expanded, caused many deaths among the tribes.. who knows what kind you'll end up against....
11.title: Native Hungers

choices: Two caravans in one day, your going to be fat as a bear...
A hunting party looking for the last group you ate
114.content:
Swings-with-branches... Swings for short, Your a healthy beast of the wilds, Dressed in light garb that is both functional and helps you blend in where your natural fur wouldn't, but your biggest asset in hunting his nor silence, and the natural tendency for people just to miss you. You say little, you tend to blend into the wilds even in plain site, its a useful talent.. THat and your hunger, your belly just seems to stretch and stretch, a slide of your paw down to the bulge....

You silently watch the world from your resting place, sitting in a hammock between two large oak trees, the remains of a caravan littered around you. You had them from moment one, there money and there lives.. you kept the beasts of burden, they had use.. to carry the same goods, just caravan under new managment after you pawed through it

You lost your tribe years ago, a secret shame, there was nothing left, and you ran. You ran west as long as you could and found your way here. the land is fertile, trade is good. Your not picky on who you take advantage of, the strong make the rules. There is no other way. You hate those who slew your tribe of course ,but no one else came to help so there not off your eating list..

"Burpsssss.." yes, those were good foxes in that caravan.. yes they were wigglers all the way down.. you stroke your stomach idly. Lifting your head you sniff the approach of more .. things.. if they smell.. there possible food.. only you matter afterall..
114.title: Swings with Branches awakes

choices: They are no match for you.
1142.content:
"Sniff, Sniff" You smell something approaching. Men, and lots of them. But you also smell something else. "Sniff, Sniff"

Gunpowder.

It can not be hunters since these parts of the woods is not very rich on big prey. It can only be one other answer to it. They are a hunting party, probably searching for the missing caravan.

You are still very full from your last meal (and your bloated stomach will also make it harder for you to stay hidden), but you are used to having it hard. You have been hiding and fighting your whole life, and this is no exception.

They may have guns but you know this forests well. You know all the great ways to sneak up on them, and how to scare them up.

Hearing them coming really close to your resting place you get out of your hammock quickly and prepare yourself for defending your small but personal area.
1142.title: A hunting party looking for the last group you ate

choices: A 6'6 Mountain man Goat , far from civilzation
12.content: Taking the side of those who are taming the west, good show, but the choices of profession here are wild and expansive, from the people of the town who want to make a living to the criminals who prey on the innocents for their own gain to those who search out solitude for its own sake or Greed. Take your pick and hitch a ride on the stage coach to adventure
12.title: Your Character

122.content:
You're name is Billy Bob Bull. You're mighty proud to be the sherrif of this town. You chew idley on a straw and watch the world go by.

Suddenly!
122.title: a 8 foot Steer sheriff

1221.content:
You hear a crash and you turn you're head to see a Ram being thown out the dance hall window!

You rush over to the dance hall!

"What's going on here?" You ask
1221.title: Trouble at the dance hall

choices: Take your stallion mount and ride to your safehouse
123.content:
Flipping your tail you stare at the strong box of the train. You don't have much time, you rode up to the train engine as it was stopping because of your little "blockage" on the tracks. Your a trainrobber by nature, and quite a good one, smart, strong, fast. A roo of the wild west that has never taken to civilization. All that matters is the money, all sides respect the glitter of gold, sure there are the pricks who claim to be virtuous but they are few and far between. Standing just over 7 feet with such a handsome visage that you've been able to pause as a damsel in distress from time to time to lure people into a false sense of security.

You climbed up and threatened the engineer and his assistant, they wouldn't give you the keys so you figure you'll sort it out later, you would have eaten them anyway, two delicious looking bunnies they were, People would suspect soon so you took the safebox and anything else you could think of before making off with your ill gotten booty. Life is good in the Wild west, Roo the day you were born, you will be the greatest legend of them all
123.title: Against the law

choices: Meet your old freind the gumaker.
1232.content:
You leap from the locomotive and land a few feet from your horse, a huge beast, ready to run and take your weight, a few seconds later you hurl yourself onto its back and give it a slap "Git" you grunt, holding yourself down while you make your getaway.

Your hideout is about 40 miles away, in the desolate and depraved town of deadbelch, law is unknown, the place is rough as the hard desert life, people live and die there daily, some are survivors, some are devoured, you've always been among the top. They say its seedy, they say the scum of the west lives here, boy are they right.. but first things first...
1232.title: to Deadbelch!

12321.content:
You visit the brothel first, and the ladies there coo and wave their handkerchiefs at you.
After all, you are a loyal customer. And though most of the ladies and gents here are a bit worn-out looking, there are always one or two pretty ones to keep you entertained. It's just a pity they're the ones who usually get eaten.
You mosey on over to the front desk, and lean heavily on it, smiling at the elderly owl, the madame who glares at you from beneath very thick eye-shadow. You lower the bandanna that had been covering your muzzle and hiding your identity. No reason to worry about that in this lawless town. You give her your most charming grin, but she's unimpressed. You drop the attempt at pleasantries and just ask her about any good whores. That bunny from last time was a good lay, but she reports that the rabbit disappeared. Too bad, you kinda liked the lapine, and hope that was one whore who managed to land a spouse and leave this life behind. More likely that someone just decided they were hungry after screwing the poor bunny, but hey.
The madame drolly informs you that she has no less than four new whores in, and asks which gender interests you. You snort at her barb. You want a whore the same sex as the bunny of course!
You want a -
12321.title: Whore time!

123211.content:
She doesn't bat an eyelid at your fuming, and just rings the bell next to her. You hear heavy footsteps as someone comes downstairs, and the clack of boots as someone else comes in from another room.
Both arrive at the same time, and you eye your two potential bed-mates for tonight.
The tall and muscular horse smiles amiably at you, chewing a long piece of straw and tipping his hat at you. Besides the hat, he's wearing only a vest, a pair of chaps, and jeans that do nothing to hide his ample maleness. The madame introduces him as Yorick, a newcomer from a farm. For a greenhorn at whoring, he seems perfectly at ease, and tilts his head invitingly at you.
The shorter one is a coyote, who is by no means muscular, but fills out his pants nicely. He still has some baby-fat clinging to him, even though he looks to be in his late teens. Much more nervous than Yorick, he tips his tophat at you and turns around quickly so you can get a brief glimpse of his front and back. He's wearing a fancy suit and a pair of glasses, and seems almost out of place here. The madame tells you his name is Jeremie, who came into the service not long after Yorick.
Now you have your choice of these two handsome fellas. A big studly horse to plow, or a proper little gent to ravish.
Then again, you did make a lot on that robbery. You could easily afford both.
After some deliberation, you decide...
123211.title: Fella'!

choices: Give Yorick a proper ass fuck
12321111.content:
You decide to choose Yorick, the sturdy plow horse.

You give your gold to the owl, and you take Yorick to the master bedroom, the one with the king size bed, and vase full of roses, a real class act.

The two of you enter the room, the room smells of roses and jasmine

Yorick unzips his pants and takes off his vest (Though he keeps his hat on)

He lays down on the bed and winks invitingly at you, taunting you, encouraging you to get on with your dirty deeds.

You takes his massive horse cock in your hands and lick it like a great big lollipop! You taste the first dribbles of pre this horse is as horny as you are!

You decide to...
12321111.title: Yorick.

123212.content:
She rolls her eyes at that, but rings the bell before you can start to raise a ruckus.
With some giggles and the rustle of dresses, a pair of fine looking ladies walk into the room to hopefully tempt you to some sinful doings.
The one in the red dress is a plumper, voluptuous raccoon gal, who used plenty of blush and make up to gussy herself up. She seems a bit shy, but the way she runs her hands down her wide hips and generous curves suggest that she could get over that shyness pretty damn quick. Seeing you stare so intently, she giggles nervously and hides her face behind a fan, peeking out over the top and then ducking back behind it. The madame lets you know that her name is Ruby.
The dame in the purple dress is a pretty hen, who's a lot less shy, putting her hands on her hips and inhaling deeply to show off her assets. Not as big and busty as Ruby, she has quite the firm pair, and the gleam in her eye suggests she knows how to make you happy you picked her. Her comb falls over one eye and gives her a very flirtatious look, and she turns to the side and wiggles an elbow at you, also showing off her behind by profile. The madame calls her Violet.
Wow. Quite the decision!
Who do you want to spend the night with?
123212.title: Filly!

choices: Pull out and let her suck you
1232121.content:
You decide you can't resist the plump and voluptuous Ruby, she giggles happily as the two of you head to an empty room to make love.

The room is darkly lit and the air smells of lilac scented perfume, you toss Ruby to the bed, the Raccoon gasps with shock, as you causally, rip off her dress exposing her furry breasts with dark nipples, you gently push her back down onto the pillow and grin, courteous and kind yet at the same time full of barbaric lust.

"There's just one thing you should know about me before we get started." You inform her "It doesn't matter weather you're a virgin or not, when I do ya it still hurts going in."

With that you unzip your fly and plummet your Marsupial Manhood deep into her treasure.

"OH GOD!" She gasps the first words she's said "IT HURTS! IT HURTS!"

"Just let thing's run there course." You say as you ravish her "It hurts when it starts, but it feels good when it finishes!"

Ruby gasps and squeals as you continue, pain slowly giving way to pleasure...As you feel you're about to climax...
1232121.title: Ruby!

A rough and tough human, to get the job done.
Eaqualy as hearty of a furry for fluffy situations.
15.content: You can't have a Western without Cowboys! Are you a member of a table rousing group of unsavory individuals or someone else?
15.title: Rangers

info.brief_description: A western themed story where characters are far more likely to be devoured than shot
info.description:
A wild west story with alot of vore on it, There are a few sides in the west. No side is inheriently good or bad, but conflict will arise...

some background on the major groups
The Natives, Most predator Tribes
The Stockaders. Settlers in built up towns or forts. Mostly herbivorous species
The Continental Army. A strange group from the east cost... Might be to put down the natives, or the pull the stockaders into line.


NO underaged characters. Can't see them being too appropriate in the setting
info.pretty_title: A Slurped Up like Spaggetti Western
